title: Angus and the Dead City
description: Angus may not have a dad, but he has a sword. Carrick Draibias no longer lives. He died a 'glorious' death in a border skirmish, leaving his son and wife to deal with life in a patriarch-centered society.But his heritage lives on. And the nation's citizens, warring tribesmen to the east, and even a goddess are all interested in his son, Angus, and the history that lies in his blood.
author: Eliza   Grey
